Steve does not open the box and does not look inside. Steve reads the label. He opens the box and looks inside. He can clearly see that it is full of

gems, sparkling brilliantly under the dim vault lights. The sight takes Steve's breath away. For a moment, he is lost in the beauty of the precious stones, their facets reflecting the light in a kaleidoscope of colors. He wonders why the box was labeled "books" when it clearly contained something far more valuable.
